title: Bobby’s Dog Had ‘Oh No’ Moment + Amy’s Son Is Taking “Ninjastics” + Eddie Brings Sad News to the Show
itunes:title: Bobby’s Dog Had ‘Oh No’ Moment + Amy’s Son Is Taking “Ninjastics” + Eddie Brings Sad News to the Show
description:
Bobby’s dog Stanley did something yesterday that became an issue. Amy’s son is taking a new class that Bobby has never heard before. Eddie brings in a news story that he delivers as the saddest news ever. We give our controversial list of things we find oddly hot.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
